Accessibility Pro Toolkit

Cross Product

Menu Path : Operator > Math > Vector

The Cross Product uniform Operator performs a cross-product between two input vectors and outputs the result.

The cross-product of two vectors is a vector that is perpendicular to the two vectors. Its length depends on the angle between the two input vectors as well as their length.

The cross-product of two perpendicular normalized vectors is a normalized vector perpendicular to the two vectors.

Operator properties

Input Type Description
A Configurable The first vector of the cross product.
B Configurable The second vector of the cross product.
Output Type Description
Output Dependent The result of the cross product.
The Type changes to match the type of A and B.

Operator configuration

To view this uniform Operator's configuration, click the cog icon in the Node's header. Here you can configure the data type this Operator uses.

Available types

You can use the following types for your Input values and ports:

  • Position
  • Vector
  • Direction
  • Vector3
